Ad Group.description: The name or ID of the ad group to which the app install ad belongs.

App Id.description: The unique identifier of the mobile app being promoted.

Campaign.description: The name or ID of the advertising campaign associated with the app install ad.

Client Id.description: The unique identifier of the client or advertiser account.

Custom Parameter.description: Optional custom parameters configured for tracking purposes.

Device Preference.description: Device preference targeting for the app install ad.

Editorial Appeal Status.description: The editorial appeal status of the ad.

Editorial Location.description: The editorial location where the ad is being reviewed.

Editorial Reason Code.description: The editorial reason code indicating the reason for disapproval of the ad.

Editorial Status.description: The editorial status of the ad (e.g., pending, approved, disapproved).

Editorial Term.description: The editorial term triggered in the review process.

Final Url.description: The final URL users are directed to after clicking the app install ad.

Final Url Suffix.description: Additional tracking information appended to the final URL.

Id.description: The unique identifier of the app install ad.

Modified Time.description: The date and time when the app install ad was last modified.

Parent Id.description: The ID of the parent object to which the app install ad belongs.

Publisher Countries.description: List of countries targeted for publishing the app install ad.

Status.description: The status of the app install ad (e.g., enabled, paused, deleted).

Text.description: The text content of the app install ad.

Title.description: The title of the app install ad.

Tracking Template.description: The tracking template URL for monitoring ad performance.
